#!/bin/bash
while IFS=',' read -r name email age; do
    if [[ "$age" -gt 18 ]]; then
        echo "Processing: $name ($email)"
        curl -X POST https://api.example.com/users \
            -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
            -d "{\"name\":\"$name\",\"email\":\"$email\",\"age\":$age}"
    fi
done < users.csv
